mapper.select: SELECT b.odate , b.profit FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.odate,'%Y-%m') as odate, SUM(i.itemprice) profit FROM admin a INNER JOIN facility f ON a.facilityid=f.facilityid INNER JOIN orders o ON f.facilityid=o.facilityid INNER JOIN item i ON i.itemid=o.itemid WHERE aid=#{aid} GROUP BY odate ORDER BY odate DESC LIMIT 10) b ORDER BY b.odate;

SELECT b.odate , b.cust_count FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.odate,'%Y-%m') as odate, COUNT(*) cust_count FROM admin a INNER JOIN facility f ON a.facilityid=f.facilityid INNER JOIN orders o ON f.facilityid=o.facilityid WHERE aid=#{aid} GROUP BY odate ORDER BY odate DESC LIMIT 10) b ORDER BY b.odate;

SELECT b.odate , b.cust_count FROM(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.odate,'%Y-%m') as odate, COUNT(*) cust_count FROM admin a INNER JOIN orders o ON o.instructorid=a.instructorid WHERE o.instructorid=#{instructorid} GROUP BY o.odate ORDER BY o.odate DESC LIMIT 10) b ORDER BY b.odate;

SELECT (CASE WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 59 THEN '60대 이상' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 49 THEN '50대' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 39 THEN '40대' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 29 THEN '30대' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 19 THEN '20대' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 09 THEN '10대' END) AS age_group, c.gender AS gender FROM admin a INNER JOIN facility f ON a.facilityid=f.facilityid INNER JOIN orders o ON f.facilityid=o.facilityid INNER JOIN cust c ON o.custid=c.custid WHERE aid=#{aid} ORDER BY o.odate DESC;

SELECT (CASE WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 59 THEN '60대 이상' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 49 THEN '50대' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 39 THEN '40대' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 29 THEN '30대' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 19 THEN '20대' WHEN (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-DATE_FORMAT(c.birth,'%Y')+1) > 09 THEN '10대' END) AS age_group, c.gender AS gender FROM admin a INNER JOIN facility f ON a.facilityid=f.facilityid INNER JOIN orders o ON f.facilityid=o.facilityid inner join instructor i on i.instructorid=o.instructorid INNER JOIN cust c ON o.custid=c.custid WHERE o.instructorid=#{instructorid} ORDER BY o.odate DESC;
